project_descr: This project will support the capacity of the Government to create an inclusive space for dialogue and reconciliation as well as support women and youths engagement in peace and reconciliation.

outputs.output_descr: Changes made to allocated activity line budget but no changes to overall project allocated budget. Regional, national, local and traditional governance systems are strengthened.
